PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-01732022-02-24,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to 1) add three hundred and fifty-one (351) individuals and one (1) entity to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; 2) move one (1) entity from Schedule 2 to Schedule 1 of the Regulations to broaden the prohibitions imposed; 3) add a new subsection and Schedule to the Regulations to prohibit dealings in Russian sovereign debt and impose a direct economic cost on Russia's agressive actions; 4) add three (3) entities to the new Schedule 3.1 of the Regulations; and 5) add new language under Section 2 to expand the criteria under which individuals and entities can be listed.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0027 Publication Date: 2022-03-16
AttachmentsAttachment
